message: Let's start with a fair split. I think 60/40 is a good place to begin.
I'm not sure a 60/40 split is fair, considering the inflation rate favors me in this scenario. Let's try 60/40 with the roles reversed - I'll take 60%, you get 40%.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45, with me taking 55% this time.
